items.sentence: I\'m feeling much better today than I was yesterday.
I\'m getting sick and tired of all your complaining.
I\'m going to miss all of you when I move to Boston.
I don\'t think we have enough food to feed everyone.
There isn\'t much doubt about the cause of the fire.
I only threatened to shoot Tom. I didn\'t shoot him.
Someone broke into Tom\'s house while he was asleep.
Why are you pretending you can\'t understand French?
Why didn\'t you tell me you had a friend in the FBI?
Why didn\'t you tell me you were lactose intolerant?
